metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35518 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: When binding against a DN during authentication, the reply from 389-ds-base will be different whether the DN exists or not. This can be used by an unauthenticated attacker to check the existence of an entry in the LDAP database.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
